version_description:
What’s new in version 1.0.10:
- Improved performance for the iPod Touch 4G and original iPad.

*The following content was added as part of Dragonfire – the 4th expansion for Celtic Heroes*

Explore the depths of the underworld and battle mighty dragons in a quest for gold and glory - your adventure awaits!

What’s new in Celtic Heroes: Dragonfire
+ Enhanced HD Graphics
+ 3 New Zones, doubling the size of the game world!
+ Thousands more quests, weapons, armour and fashion items
+ Level up to 200
+ Defeat powerful new enemies
+ New in-game mail system
+ Challenging new daily quests
+ PvP Combat Leaderboards

What’s new in version 1.0.10:
- Improved performance for the iPod Touch 4G and original iPad.

Explore the depths of the underworld and battle mighty dragons in a quest for gold and glory - your adventure awaits!

+ Thousands more quests, weapons, armour and fashion items
+ Level up to 200

+ New in-game mail system
+ Challenging new daily quests
+ PvP Combat Leaderboards

• Added “Fast Graphics” option to improve raid performance
• Improved default performance on iPhone 4, iPad Mini 1 and iPad 2
• Bug and device scaling fixes, including resolved log-in issues on iPad 1, iPod 4, and iPhone 3gs

• Added “Fast Graphics” option to improve raid performance
• Improved default performance on iPhone 4, iPad Mini 1 and iPad 2
• Bug and device scaling fixes, including resolved log-in issues on iPad 1, iPod 4, and iPhone 3gs

World expansion: 5 new zones complete with new ferocious enemies and challenging quests!

GELEBRON'S TOWER expansion

Only Gelebron knows the twisted purpose of his tower of Gallan Marrak; mastering the otherworldly energies that leap and spark between the spyrestone crystals adorning its walls and a beacon to the forces of evil, drawn by their wanton lust for power.

•The Bridge of Despair – Spanning the chasm of Doch Gul, keen eyed patrols are ready to encircle the unwary and throw them to their doom.
•Infernal Armouries – Gelebron’s army is tempered with the very magicks that course through the tower, corrupting their minds to their new commander.
•Alchemical Quarters – Imps slave to the whims of cunning alchemists, who seek their master’s approval by mixing fiendish compounds to enhance their arts.
•Summoning Chambers – Tormented souls and mighty wyverns have been summoned and bound, patrolling tirelessly to protect the tower from invaders.
•The Forbidden Halls – The abominax patrol, their evil eyes glaring out for living miscreants who would risk disturbing their masters plans.

New Enemies!

•Onyxhounds – Mighty wizards animated statues of hounds carved from onyx spyrestone, creating viscous, merciless beasts with razor sharp claws and teeth.
•Guards – Warlords came to the tower, seeking power, where their mighty armies were subjugated to Gelebron’s will, forging rugged arms and armour to protect their new commander.
•Wizards – Masters of forbidden lore, corrupted by the evil seeping from the tower's very pores, they will stop at nothing to please their lord and ascend.
•Imps – Thieves drawn to the arcane energies within Gallan Marrak, they were caught, enslaved and now serve as menial workers and guards for the alchemists.
•Hexwyrm – Summoners drew the mighty wyverns of North Run to the tower, tethering them to their will and using their magical powers to protect Gelebron.
•Enchanted Armour – Nightmare ghasts, drawn to evil and bound to dead men’s armour, they patrol the dark corridors and vast chambers tirelessly, seeking enemies to destroy.
•Abominax – Observing all others with their hideous glare these monstrous eyes are only truly loyal to their rightful master.
•Sentinels – Created from the very stone that forms the tower of Gallan Marrak these mighty warriors are rarely felled and wield their weapons in ferocious attacks.

New Quests!

•Sentinel Quests –Win the right to get to the next level of the tower where you’ll face even greater challenges.
•Exalted Dragonlord Armour and Weapons Quest Chain – Defeat the cruellest, most daunting foes across the tower to gain a powerful new Raid armour set. The wizards in the tower have twisted the Dragonlord Amour to their own ends imbuing it with even more power and a malevolently striking appearance.
•Solo Armour Quests - The Alchemical Affairs and Occult Oddities quests will let you gather items from the formidable opponents across the tower to gain new Wizard and Guard styled armour sets.
•Daily Repeatable Quests – Daily repeatable quests on each floor for those brave, or foolish enough, to keep up the challenge.

New Rewards!

•Exalted Dragonlord armour – A powerful new addition to the raid armour sets
•Occult and Alchemical armours – Fantastic armour sets that echo the designs of the tower itself
•Runic and Eldritch Luxury items – New luxury items imbued with Gelebron’s dark powers
•Jewellery drops – Get the edge with new items looted from the denizens of the tower
•Thaumaturgic and Spellwrought gear – Some thrifty servants of Gelebron have powerful new weapons and armour… for a price.
•Gold and XP mobs – Rare mobs that grant a fortune in gold and XP but watch out; you’ll have to earn it

Numerous bug-fixes and improvements to performance and stability are included in this build.

Beltane has arrived! The Sages of Brath have been called upon to help defend Dal Riata from the Morcas creatures...

New Features:
- NEW: Bird Novelty Companions
- NEW: Beltane Steeds
- Bounty Board; daily on-level bounties for XP, gold and more!

Event details:
Defeat Skain Banebark
Aid The Sages of Brath
Sage Luxury and Mount vendors
Wandering Morcas creatures with rare Beltane rewards
Lustrous Mystery Chest including Sanghal Fashion, new Armour charms and cool Spirit Cape mounts

Something spooky this way comes!

NEW EVENT: The festival of Samhain is now live throughout Lir’s Reach! Now’s your chance to protect the lands against the spooks and join the seasonal festivities!

NEW EXPANSION: Arcane Sanctum is a brand new level of Gelebron’s Tower complete with Gelebron himself, challenging the strongest and bravest of Heroes!

- Hundreds of new challenges, festive quests and bounties
- Epic unique fashion and rare items
- Awesome new mounts
- Brand new event bosses and enemies
- Battle the mighty and powerful Gelebron in the new expansion to Gelebron's Tower: Arcane Sanctum

Also includes various other game improvements including interface updates and brand new skill effects

The Winter frost is upon us!

• Fight the Monolith of the Blight Tomb: Evil god Taranis’ bane of Dal Riata.
• Engage in over seventy new Winter Yule bounty quests.
• Epic unique fashion and rare items
• Awesome new winter mounts

Other improvements
• New Quest Page tells you what rewards you are questing for
• Explore the Abandoned Pier in Lir’s Reach and defeat its ghostly denizens
• Proteus has spread his evil in the Arcane Sanctum. Defeat him for new loot drops

Heroes gather to battle the invading Connacht horde!
• Awesome new pets, you can train, upgrade and grant special skills to aid your journey.
• Challenge Smolach the Annihilator: The Connacht’s greatest dragon.
• Epic Bounty Vendor trades Bounty Tokens for a selection of valuable goods.
• Battle the Elite Huntsman in The Otherworld to gain special, upgradeable bracelets.
• Legendary, unique Highlander fashion and other rare items.
• Incredible new boar mounts.

Other improvements
• Enhance your adventures with a stunning new starting experience.
• Customisable chat box, allows you to keep up to date with your friends.
• Decide which quests you mark active, helping you achieve your goals.
• Auto Level system helps new players to get right to the heart of the action.
• Over seventy new bounties to engage with.

The Seafarers have arrived on Dal Riatas shores!
• Set out on your journey to become a grand master angler with the new fishing system.
• Old is new again! Explore the mighty Farcrag Castle in its revitalised state.
• Hunt down rare and powerful ancient bosses from ages past throughout the lands.
• Three new sets of epic fashion, as well as new fashion vendors to provide them.
• Battle new mid-level bosses in The Otherworld and Carrowmore tunnels to gain powerful ancient potions and increase your combat prowess.
• The legendary mounts of the Sacred Watch can be yours to command!

Other improvements
• Continue the main quest by facing fearsome foes in The Otherworld, Carrowmore Tunnels, and the Murky Vaults.
• Many fantastic new abilities to train, including Critical Hits and Treasure Hunter!
• Have the Epic Bounty Vendor upgrade your Bounty Tokens into higher tiers.
• More new pets to battle alongside and train, granting you special skills to aid your journey.

The Seafarers have arrived on Dal Riatas shores!
• Set out on your journey to become a grand master angler with the new fishing system.
• Old is new again! Explore the mighty Farcrag Castle in its revitalised state.
• Hunt down rare and powerful ancient bosses from ages past throughout the lands.
• Three new sets of epic fashion, as well as new fashion vendors to provide them.
• Battle new mid-level bosses in The Otherworld and Carrowmore tunnels to gain powerful ancient potions and increase your combat prowess.
• The legendary mounts of the Sacred Watch can be yours to command!

Other improvements
• Continue the main quest by facing fearsome foes in The Otherworld, Carrowmore Tunnels, and the Murky Vaults.
• Many fantastic new abilities to train, including Critical Hits and Treasure Hunter!
• Have the Epic Bounty Vendor upgrade your Bounty Tokens into higher tiers.
• More new pets to battle alongside and train, granting you special skills to aid your journey.
Preparation for the end-of-year release.

+ Updated Fashion Vendor store text.
+ Additional fixes to certain bounty quests.
+ Main Menu Offers icon now highlights correctly when an offer is available.
+ Additional server fixes
+ Many other small fixes, conversations, quest text, etc.

== Corrupted Gardens Update ==

- New Zone: Corrupted Gardens.
Enter the realm of the gods! Once a land of peace and beauty, the Gardens of Rath Parras have become a corrupted land of never ending war.

- New Raid Boss: Bloodthorn the Ravenous.
Can you sever the connection between this monster and its well of eldritch power, or will you succumb to the vile toxins that surge through the ravenous maw of Bloodthorn?

- New Faction System.
Reaver and Lich forces clash in an eternal struggle outside the walls of Rath Parras, each desperate to eradicate the other. Will you side with the well marshaled forces of the Reavers or the arcane prowess of the Liches?

- New Faction Bosses: High Warlord Auraxis & Archlich Thanasis.
New treasures to be gained by heroes brave enough. Fight side by side with heroes of your faction to claim faction dominance!

- New Seasonal Hat Quest: Forest Guard Helm.
A flight of corrupted drakes have infested the lands of Dal Riata, seeking to imbalance the natural order of new life during Ostara. Fight back these beasts and earn a Forest Guard Helm.

- New Fashion: Demonheart.
A new chest exclusive exotic fashion acquired from far-off lands.

- Facebook Login System.
Connect your Facebook account and easily sign in!

Update News:
**New Raid** - Gather your clan and friends and save Lir's Reach from Dhiothu, a cunning arcane dragon who hoards powerful magical artifacts!
**New Equipment** - New stronger weapons and accessories are available those brave enough to beat the new boss.
**New Global Zone** - Farcrag Castle is now global! Meet other heroes from all realms in one central location!
**New Pets** - New Pig and Corrupted Seedling pets are available to collect!
**New Fashion** Winter is out and spring is here! Acquire all the pieces of the Scoithniamh Fashion Set.
**New Mystery Chest** Everbloom Mystery Chest has a chance to drop the Corrupted Seedling Pet and Scoithniamh Fashion Set.

Bug Fixes & Improvements:
Memory improvements and various bug fixes to increase performance.

Yule 2018 Has Arrived to Dal Riata!
- Snowy environmental effects to the world.
- New event quest with a unique fashion reward!
- New unique Jester Fashion now available!
- Special Snowfall Mystery Chest available for a limited time!

Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements
- Improved performance for all devices
- Reduced battery use during play
- Fixed an issue with freezing during boss fights

- Fixed issue with world selection for new players.
- Added drop rate information to chest descriptions.
Additional bug fixes

Samhain has arrived and the things are getting spookier in Dal Riata!

- The dead rise and plague Lir's Reach! Send them back to their graves and earn useful consumables.
- Work together with other players to defeat an evil witch in the Global Arena!
- Legacy Samhain fashion and novelties will now be obtainable, while Ostara fashions go back into the vault.
- Storm the battlefield with the new Hellsteed Mount
- Participate in community contests to win rare fashion sets!
- Minor bug fixes

Celebrate the Holidays with Yule!

* New winter biome in effect for Lir's Reach and Farcrag Castle - brrrr!
* New Festive Reindeer pet! A great leveling companion available for a limited time only!
* New Permanent & Holiday Recipes for players to discover.
* New Everfrost Mystery Chest with legacy Yule fashion sets and novelties!
* New Hat Quest: Earn the Winterblight Crown by returning the stolen presents from Greedy Goblins.
* Bug Fixes and performance improvements.

New Feature: Sign in with Apple
You can now create an account or upgrade an existing account using your Apple ID.

How to Create a New Account using Sign in with Apple:
1. At the title screen, select 'Sign in as'
2. Select Sign in with Apple
3. Enter your Apple ID credentials to be taken to character select.

How to Upgrade an Existing Account:
1. Login to your account normally.
2. At Character Select, press the Options button.
3. Select 'Link to Sign in with Apple'
4. Enter your Apple ID credentials.
**Please note: Once you upgrade your account, you will no longer be able to use your username and password. This can not be undone.**

* The update is optional and not required to play *
